Windlord:

"Organics... I don't like secrets among us..."said the male whose 
wans'0t sure to confess this"I... I once loved a lady... but she's 
gone and now I love you... and I don't like lost you... try to be 
carefull... if somethings happen you I wouldn't like continue 
living "
